<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|byte|LodestoneTracked}}: Optional. 1 or 0 (true/false) - true if the compass is connected to a [[lodestone]]. When false, {{cd|LodestoneDimension}} and {{cd|LodestonePos}} is not automatically removed when the lodestone is destroyed, but the compass still points to that location.
** {{nbt|string|LodestoneDimension}}: Optional. The dimension of the lodestone to which the compass is pointing.
** {{nbt|compound|LodestonePos}}: Optional. The coordinates of the lodestone to which the compass is pointing.
*** {{nbt|int|X}}: x coordinate
*** {{nbt|int|Y}}: y coordinate
*** {{nbt|int|Z}}: z coordinate
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
